QuestData.Title: Restorer's Vow
QuestData.Description: You've made your pledge, $c. Now it is up to you to see it through.$B$BServe the Scale of the Sands well and you will be rewarded. Fail and the timeline as we know it will be unravelled!
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring your Band of Eternity to Soridormi at the Caverns of Time after obtaining Honored reputation with the Scale of the Sands.
QuestData.CompletionText: You continue to serve us well, $N.
QuestData.RewardText: You've proved your worth, $r. Up to a certain point, at least.$B$BThe favor of Nozdormu's prime mate is not obtained easily.
